item.title: Homeland Security chief says travelers with no REAL ID can fly for now, but with likely extra steps
item.description: The head of Homeland Security says travelers who arenâ€™t REAL ID compliant by the upcoming deadline this week will still be able to fly but should be prepared for extra scrutiny.

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to admit roughly 12,000 refugees
These are the US cardinals who will vote for the next pope
